EmailTemplate.name: Day-Before-Details.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Details for Bain Breakfast Tomorrow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=}}, I'm very much looking forward to meeting up tomorrow, and first wanted to provide you with details for breakfast. As a reminder, we'll begin at 7:30 a.m. You have been pre-cleared with Hancock Tower Security, so you need only present a valid Driver's License/ID.
We'll be in the Weather Beacon Conference Room on the 39th Floor, Bain Capital Ventures. Once past security, simply take the elevator to Floor 39, where you'll be greeted by a VMTurbo team member.
If you have any questions on your way up, please contact VMTurbo's JR Butler at 774.249.4299.
Looking forward to it, {{lead.Lead Owner First Name:default=}} 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
